participant_1.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned the value of hard work and perseverance.
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
I'm an independent person who likes my own company, but I still love my family.
I am a female in my early 20s.
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.

participant_2.background:
I used to babysit my younger siblings a lot, but now they're all old enough to take care of themselves.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
i drive a moped.
i m saving up to buy a new camera.
My pets are always there to listen to me when I need to vent my feelings.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a long walk with my dog, Shadow.
That sounds fun! I love walking my dog. What breed is Shadow?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
Yeah, they're great dogs. Do you have any pets?
I have two cats, Mittens and Snowball.
Aww, I love cats! They're so cute.
Yeah, they're pretty great. What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, read books, and watch movies.
I like those things too! What kind of games do you like to play?
I like all kinds of games, but I mostly play RPGs and action games.
Cool, me too! I love RPGs.
Me too! They're so immersive.
Yeah, they are. I'm currently playing Skyrim.
Oh, I love Skyrim! That's a great game.
Yeah, it is! I've been playing it for years.
Me too! I've lost count of how many times I've played it.
I know what you mean. It's so addicting.
Yeah, it is
